title: Plagiarism Detector
accomplishments: Designed system architecture and created a stateless server using Node.js, Express.js to detect and identify plagiarism between multi-file programs using efficient structural comparison techniques
Designed algorithm to detect similarities in the code that attempts to avoid detection by performing AST transformations
Developed UI with React by considering usability heuristic principles to selectively examine and compare similarities

title: eShopR
accomplishments: Designed scalable ecommerce application with a seller portal for inventory management and to analyze purchase trends
Created landing page builder using React allowing sellers to dynamically design web pages to present personalized stores
Implemented product search and recommendation using Elasticsearch to retrieve results 60% faster
